mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders (total_price, created_at, imp_uid, merchant_uid, name, phone, email, postcode, address, detail_address, amount, point_amount) VALUES (#{totalPrice}, #{createdAt}, #{impUid}, #{merchantUid}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{postcode}, #{address}, #{detailAddress}, #{amount}, #{pointAmount})
